chapters.title: Prologue: Snow
chapters.info: Shalon din Togara Morning Tide, p. 76 (75)—Windfinder of Clan Shodein. She was left under a bed, bound with the Power and shielded, by Rand, in the middle of the attack by the Asha'man. She has not been seen since. See also din Togara Two Winds, Harine.
